alert.note: Alert for Central and Southern Scott County; Northern Scott County; Northwest Yell County; Southern and Eastern Logan County; Western and Northern Logan County (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 16 at 11:29AM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Logan, northeastern Scott and northwestern Yell Counties through NOON CDT... At 1128 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Charleston to near Burnville to near Huntington to near Midland. Movement was east at 50 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Booneville... Paris... Mansfield... Magazine... Ratcliff... Blue Mountain... Mount Magazine... Cardiff... Echo... Caulksville... Barber... Waveland... Lucas... Chismville... Driggs... Sugar Grove... Carolan... Corley... Grayson... Glendale in Logan County... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
